attributes.action: ensure longer sentences are issued and all the sentence is served
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Judges are handing out short sentences for serious crimes and in some case even letting them go free because of the pressure placed upon them by the over crowding and other interfering factors. Judges will not hand out long sentences as they are liekly to be appealed against and this will look bad especially for senior judges.

For those people that do go prison which is more like a holiay camp now they can apply for parole after serving just half of their sentence they can apply for parole.

Sign this parole and ensure criminals are punished for serious crimes and not just given a smack on the wrist.
